column4: I want to clone an ubuntu instllation over the network to multiple machines which have same hardware
i tried using clonezilla with drbl server, but while i tried booting the client over pxe, i got tftp timeout
i have to install on more than 80 machines so dd image is going to be too cumbersome
i've not looked at clonezilla's live CD options, but maybe it has a network drive option?
